tool_description: Processes multiple metadata records simultaneously with transformation, enhancement, and bulk operations capabilities.

input_records.description: Array of metadata records or file paths to process

operation_type.description: Batch operation: enhance, transform, validate, deduplicate

target_schema.description: Target metadata schema for transformation operations

enhancement_fields.description: Fields to enhance with additional metadata

batch_size.description: Number of records to process in each batch

preserve_originals.description: Whether to preserve original records during processing

error_messages: Invalid operation type: Use enhance, transform, validate, or deduplicate
Empty input records: Provide at least one record to process
Invalid batch size: Batch size must be between 1 and 1000
Missing target schema: Transform operations require target_schema parameter
Processing failed: Unable to complete batch operation
usage: Provide input_records and operation_type. For transform operations, specify target_schema. Use enhancement_fields for selective enhancement. Adjust batch_size for performance optimization.

failed_count.description: Number of records that failed processing
